did.unittitle: New Jersey. Legislature. General Assembly. Acts, 1727, 1746, 1747
did.abstract: Acts for issuing bills of credit (1727), for victualling the forces on an expedition to Canada (1746), and for further victualling forces lately raised in New Jersey on an expedition to Canada (1747).

odd.head: Early American History Note
odd.p: This collection consists of three oversized broadsides conveying laws passed by New Jersey.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Purchased and accessioned, 1956 (1329ms). See in-house shelf list for additional accession numbers.

controlaccess.subject: Colonial Politics
Colony and State Specific History
Military history, Modern -- 18th century.

did.unittitle: An act for the making of 24,760£ in bills of credit, in order to exchange the bills of credit formerly made currant in this province by an act passed in the year. . .1723;

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Amboy,Ms.D.S: John Johnston, speaker; W. Burnet, Feb. 10, 1727. 16 leaves Doc.S: Mich. Kearny, Act gives detailed instructions for printing and distributing the bills of credit. Benjamin Franklin was official printer for N.J. at this period. Printed: N.J. General Assembly, Acts…collected…by…Samuel Nevill; Bradford, 1752, p. 146. FILM 54-66 FRAME 12

did.unittitle: An act to make current 850£...for the further victualling the forces...on an expedition against Canada;

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: D.S. : Robert Lawrence, Speaker; Jo[h]n Reading; Nov. 1, 1746, John Hamilton. 4 leaves. Seal.

did.unittitle: An act to make current 1,000£ in bills of credit for the further victualling... forces lately raised in New Jersey on an expedition against Canada;

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: D.S.:Robert Lawrence, Speaker; Jno.Reading; John Hamilton. 4 leaves. Seal.
